descriptions.commercialAdvisory: Market research and feasibility services to identify growth opportunities, complemented by business strategies, branding, and digital plans to strengthen business presence and competitiveness.
descriptions.legalAdvisory: Services in real estate law and property management, with comprehensive legal support for real estate and business operations. Includes planning of architectural and urban projects, ensuring regulatory compliance and legal feasibility from start to execution.
descriptions.commercialBrokerage: Service that facilitates the connection between investors and providers, promoting exports and investments. We also manage the search and selection of business opportunities, contributing to the growth and success of companies in various markets.

content.title: For Foreign Companies
content.description: We facilitate investment, export, and entry into the Peruvian market

details.title: Consulting and Legal Advisory:
details.subtitle: We advise on the acquisition and regularization of properties for investment or expansion.
details.extra: We also provide legal support in company formation, contracts, and Peru–EU regulations.

details.title: Market Studies and Local Demand Analysis:
details.subtitle: Identification of real business opportunities in the Peruvian market.

details.title: International Commercial Brokerage:
details.subtitle: Connecting with producers, suppliers, and investment projects in Peru in strategic sectors.

content.title: For National Companies
content.description: Boosting their expansion, formalization, and growth in the local and international market

details.title: Physical-Legal Property Regularization:
details.subtitle: Comprehensive regularization of properties, factory declarations, subdivisions, and urban habilitations

details.title: Strategic Marketing Plans:
details.subtitle: Design of commercial growth strategies based on real data and market studies.

details.title: Commercial Architectural Projects:
details.subtitle: Design and technical-legal development of projects for shopping centers, markets, educational centers, multifamily and single-family homes.

content.title: For Individuals and Entrepreneurs
content.description: Formalize, protect, and enhance their personal investments or small businesses

details.title: Personalized Legal Consulting in Real Estate Law:
details.subtitle: Advisory on purchase-sale, acquisitive prescription, vindicatory action, and asset protection

details.title: Management of Procedures and Regularizations with SUNARP and Cadastre:
details.subtitle: Management of titles, subdivisions, accumulations, urban habilitations, and other technical-legal procedures.

details.title: Advisory on Identity and Commercial Strategy:
details.subtitle: Development of personal or business branding, digital positioning, and communication strategies adapted to the market

mainTitle.part3: We are the meeting point between business, investment, and international expansion, combining the precision of a legal boutique with the strategic vision and creativity of a marketing agency.

first.title: Expert Team
first.description: We have an interdisciplinary team of lawyers, architects, economists, and marketing specialists who work in a coordinated manner to deliver comprehensive solutions.

second.title: Catalysts
second.description: We provide legal advice in Real Estate, Corporate, and Commercial Law, complemented by marketing and communication strategies to drive our clients' growth.

third.title: Strategic Access
third.description: Peru is a land of opportunities, with economic stability and sustained growth. We help you access this emerging market full of possibilities in a strategic way.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To create connections between people, businesses, and investments by providing strategic legal, technical, and commercial advice that simplifies processes and transforms ideas into successful projects at both national and international levels.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To build solid realities by creating connections that drive businesses, investments, and life projects—nationally and internationally.

member1.name: NAREM ROEL GAUTO
member1.description: Narem leads New Point's expansion with a solid strategy, empathy, and effective communication, excelling in building relationships and overcoming international barriers.

data.title: Specialty:
data.description: State Contracting Arbitration and Investment Arbitration.

data.title: Outstanding Experience:
data.description: Arbitrator in arbitration competitions in Peru, Ecuador, and Austria.

data.title: Affiliations:
data.description: Director of the International Business Department – CCBLP, member of WAPPP and Arbitraje Alumni.

data.title: Fun Fact:
data.description: Musician in his free time, because business also requires rhythm and harmony. English-Spanish translator.

member2.name: CLAUDIA SILVA GARCIA
member2.description: Claudia combines her legal training with strong creative skills, allowing us to offer comprehensive solutions both in law and in business. She always bets on innovation, transforming complex ideas into clear, functional solutions.

data.title: Specialty:
data.description: Civil and real estate law. Social media design.

data.title: Outstanding Experience:
data.description: Legal advisor at the Ministry of Justice and Human Rights.

data.title: Affiliations:
data.description: Legal consultant and designer at the Chamber of Commerce and Culture of Belgium and Luxembourg in Peru.

data.title: Fun Fact:
data.description: Freelance designer for four years. Passionate about singing and creative writing.

member3.name: CARLOS ROEL MONTELLANOS
member3.description: Carlos is a multidisciplinary professional with a comprehensive approach to urban planning and economic development. He has over 40 years of experience in creating social housing projects, markets, urban equipment, and civil defenses nationwide.

data.title: Specialty:
data.description: Urban Architect, Economist, and Cadastre expert.

data.title: Outstanding Experience:
data.description: Legal physical sanitation of housing, urban habilitations, and infrastructure projects.

data.title: Affiliations:
data.description: Former member of the Institute for Urban and Social Development of Peru (IDESUR). College of Architects of Peru.

data.title: Fun Fact:
data.description: Candidate for the district mayor of Ate in 2018, demonstrating his commitment to public management and local development.

member4.name: ELIANA ROJAS QUINTO
member4.description: Eliana contributes to the team with her judgment, initiative, and passion. Her experience in the Judiciary and Arbitration provides her with a practical perspective on Law, complemented by her remarkable writing skills in Spanish and English.

data.title: Specialty:
data.description: Civil and real estate law. Legal research and writing.

data.title: Outstanding Experience:
data.description: Member of the editorial committee of the law journal “Ita Ius Esto”.

data.title: Affiliations:
data.description: Legal assistant of the International Business Department – CCBLP.

data.title: Fun Fact:
data.description: Collaborates with various institutions to provide social and community support. Cyclist in her free time.

member5.name: VERONIKA JAMARIKOVÁ
member5.description: Veronika is a multilingual jurist with international training in French, Latin American, and European law. With experience in France and training in Mexico, she combines legal analysis and intercultural sensitivity to create global solutions.

data.title: Specialty:
data.description: Private International Law, Arbitration, and European Union Law.

data.title: Outstanding Experience:
data.description: Internship in migration law and taxation in France; studies in Mexico, France, and the Netherlands.

data.title: Affiliations:
data.description: Paris Nanterre University and National Autonomous University of Mexico.

data.title: Fun Fact:
data.description: Speaks five languages and is passionate about exploring legal systems and new cultures.

member6.name: CELIA CHIRINOS VASQUEZ
member6.description: Celia brings an analytical and versatile perspective that makes her a key member of the team, both legally and organizationally. She is an outstanding student, part of the top fifth, and winner of the Lead Scholarship from the University of Piura.

data.title: Specialty:
data.description: Civil, real estate, and administrative law.

data.title: Outstanding Experience:
data.description: Winner of the “Governance in Times of Crisis” scholarship program at Panamerican University (Mexico).

data.title: Affiliations:
data.description: Legal assistant of the International Business Department – CCBLP.

data.title: Fun Fact:
data.description: Passionate about photography and languages (English, French, and German).

mainTitle.description: At New Point, we don’t just offer advice. We build real bridges between people, companies, and investments. Our approach is comprehensive, strategic, and built from experience.

cards.title: Active Network
cards.description: We have an active international network in Europe and Latin America that facilitates effective business connections.

cards.title: Agile Processes
cards.description: We simplify and accelerate legal, technical, and strategic processes, always maintaining rigor and legal security.

cards.title: Comprehensive Service
cards.description: We offer a comprehensive, multidisciplinary service to meet all our clients’ needs.

cards.title: Global Connections
cards.description: Experience in opening international markets and supporting investors, with key global alliances.

title.description: Choosing New Point means betting on a strategic and reliable vision for investing in Peru, one of the most competitive destinations in Latin America for investment and international trade.

policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.subtitle: PRIVACY POLICY
policy.company_intro: New Point Asesores S.A.C. (Hereinafter, “The Company”) guarantees respect for users' privacy and the proper handling of their personal data, in compliance with Law No. 29733 - Personal Data Protection Law, and its regulations (Supreme Decree No. 003-2013-JUS).
policy.description: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect the personal information you provide when using our website and services. By using our website, you accept everything stipulated in this Privacy Policy.
info_items: Personal information: such as full name, email address, phone number, address, and other data provided when you register or make a transaction.
Registration and usage information: such as IP address, browser type, pages visited, session duration, and browsing patterns.
policy.purpose_description_1: The processing of personal data is limited to purposes related to the Company's activities: handling inquiries, managing requests, providing services, and complying with legal or contractual obligations.
policy.purpose_description_2: It is also used to personalize the user experience, improve services, and, with your consent, send newsletters, updates, and promotions. We may use anonymized data for statistical and analytical purposes.
policy.security_description: The Company implements legal, technical, and organizational measures to protect personal data against loss, alteration, misuse, unauthorized access, or other improper processing, in accordance with current regulations.
policy.transfer_description: The Company will not share personal data with third parties except when necessary to fulfill the stated purposes, when there is a legal obligation, or when the user gives express consent.
policy.rights_description: You have the right to access, rectify, update, or delete your personal data. To exercise these rights, you can contact us through the channels indicated at the end of this Privacy Policy.
policy.changes_description: The Company reserves the right to update or modify this Policy at any time without prior notice. It is recommended to review it periodically to stay informed of any changes.
policy.contact_description: For inquiries, you can write to our official email: newpoint.asesores@gmail.com. We will respond to requests within a reasonable timeframe, in accordance with current data protection regulations and claims handling procedures.
policy.legal_note: This Privacy Policy is governed by current laws and is interpreted in accordance with them.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: TERMS AND CONDITIONS
terms.intro_1: These Terms and Conditions (“T&C”) govern access to and use of the website of New Point Asesores SAC (hereinafter, the “Company”), as well as the contracting of services offered through it, which include legal advice, business consulting, and brokerage services.
terms.intro_2: By accessing, browsing, or using the Platform, you expressly and unconditionally accept these T&C, as well as all applicable laws and regulations. Use of the Platform implies that you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by these T&C without limitation or exception. If you do not agree with them, please refrain from using the Platform or contracting our services.
terms.section_1_p1: Use of the Platform and contracting of the services offered are intended for persons of legal age who have full legal capacity to contract, in accordance with applicable legislation. By using the Platform, you declare and guarantee that you meet this requirement.
terms.section_1_p2: The user undertakes to provide truthful, updated, and complete information when registering, requesting a service, or communicating with us. We reserve the right to suspend or cancel access to the Platform and/or services if the use of false or inaccurate information is detected.
terms.section_2_p1: Legal advice: legal counseling in various branches of law for individuals and legal entities, which may include consultations, document review, assistance in administrative, notarial, and judicial procedures, as agreed.
terms.section_2_p2: Business services: consulting on business strategies, brand positioning, digital marketing, and business development.
terms.section_2_p3: Brokerage services: intermediation in business operations, including connecting suppliers and demanders and managing meetings. These may be subject to commissions or other specific terms.
terms.section_2_note: Important note: The information on the Platform is referential. It does not constitute personalized advice nor does it automatically create a contractual relationship.
terms.section_3_p1: Contracting is carried out after coordination through the Platform, official channels, or meetings. The service begins after acceptance of a formal proposal and, when applicable, the signing of a specific contract.
terms.section_4_p1: All content on the Platform is the property of the Company and is protected by intellectual property laws. Unauthorized use may be sanctioned according to the law.
terms.section_5_p1: The Company is not responsible for damages arising from the use or inability to use the Platform nor for the content of external links.
terms.section_6_p1: The Company may amend these T&C without prior notice, unless otherwise required by law. Continued use of the Platform implies acceptance of the changes.
terms.section_7_p1: These T&C are governed by Peruvian law. Any dispute will be resolved by the competent Peruvian courts.
terms.section_8_p1: For inquiries, write to newpoint.asesores@gmail.com. The Company will respond within a reasonable time and in accordance with current regulations.
